landingPage.Header: Plan your eCommerce shipments in an instant. Estimate courier charges using our quick courier charges.

welcome.Title: Welcome to MAZ Express
welcome.Caption: Your one-stop logistics solution for shipping from Turkey to Libya.
welcome.Description: Our company is committed to providing cutting-edge logistics services that are efficient, reliable, and cost-effective. At MAZ Express, we understand that shipping can be complicated and stressful. That's why we provide a simple and streamlined experience, from shopping to delivery. With experienced team, we can handle all your logistics needs, including warehousing, shipping, and tracking. Whether you're a business or an individual, we have the solutions to help you succeed. Contact us today to learn more.

trackOrder.Error: Please enter valid maz tracking ID
trackOrder.CaptionPart1: Track your order using MAZ ID without login

about.Title: About MAZ express
about.Description: Welcome to MAZ express, where we provide seamless and reliable transportation solutions to meet all your shipping needs. Our company’s main focus is providing efficient and effective services to our customers.
Content: We specialize in providing warehousing services in Istanbul for customers who shop online from Turkish retailers. Our warehouse is equipped with security measures to ensure that your goods are safe and secure. We have a team of experienced professionals who manage our warehouse operations and ensure that your goods are handled with care and precision.

We understand that every customer has unique shipping needs, which is why we offer a wide range of transportation solutions tailored to meet your specific requirements. Whether you need air, sea, or land transportation services, we have the expertise and resources to get your goods where they need to go.

So, if you're looking for a reliable logistics partner to help you with your shipping needs, look no further than our company. Contact us today to learn more about our services and how we can help you streamline your shipping operations.

Once your orders are placed, we collect them from the retailers and prepare them for shipment to Libya. Our transportation services are designed to be fast, reliable, and cost-effective. We work with a network of trusted carriers to ensure that your goods arrive at their destination on time and in perfect condition.

Our commitment to customer satisfaction is what sets us apart from other logistics providers. We are dedicated to providing exceptional customer service and communication throughout the entire shipping process. Our team is always available to answer your questions and address any concerns you may have.

content.Title: Warehousing:
content.Content: Our warehousing service enables customers to shop from Turkish online retailers and conveniently send their shipment to our ITurkish-based warehouse. We provide secure, storage and handle the consolidation and shipment of your orders to Libya by air or sea, as per your preferences.

content.Title: Shipping:
content.Content: We offer a wide range of shipping containers to ensure that we can accommodate any shipping need.

content.Title: Sea shipping:
content.Content: Our sea shipping service is reliable and efficient, with regular departures and arrivals to and from Libya. We handle all the necessary logistics, including customs clearance and documentation.

content.Title: Online tracking:
content.Content: Our online tracking system allows clients to monitor the status of their shipment from pickup to delivery, providing real-time updates and peace of mind.

Text: Register for free to get your own Turkish address instantly
Shop at any turkish retail website
Ship your purchase to your turkish address with Mazexpress
Mazexpress will combine and ship your order to you
